Text: how do you load them i always use disc but am gooing to try this .wbfs i have neogamma 7 so how would i load
@klowne420: If you want to load .wbfs files directly from FAT32/NTFS partition/hard drive then I recommend using Configurable USB Loader (http://gbatemp.net/index.php?showtopic=147638)
sorry one more question were do i put the files i DL that that loader and cant seem to figure out were to put the file

@klowne420: Just create a folder called "WBFS" on your drive/partition and copy/transfer the torrent download "folder & contents" into it ... in this case ... eg. X:\WBFS\Drawn to Life- The Next Chapter [R9DP78]
